testcase.classname: Validation of Ind Digi Agri Jewel Loan
testcase.name: Authentication Stage
testcase.system-out: Given User have to launch the URL...........................................passed When User have to enter valid CIF/SB Accountnumber..........................passed And User have to click validate button......................................passed And User have to click sendotp button.......................................passed And User have to enter valid OTP............................................passed And User have to click submitotp button.....................................passed And User should navigate to customerdetails page............................passed And User should check the purpose of loan is always agri and non editable...passed And User should enter valid email address and click generate otp and enter valid otp and click submit otp button.passed And User should select Religion-caste.......................................passed And User should click radio button of permananent address and user should check permananent address and temporary address are same.passed And User should add nominee details.........................................passed And User should enter next button...........................................passed
